path: PDF Library/30 Rock Production Engineering - Evertz Bulletins/Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- ACQ ITXE REM Upgrade PT2 12-16-20.pdf
text: Production Systems Engineering Bulletin- ACQ REM-ITXE Upgrade Part 2 12/16/20 Wednesday- 12/16/20 Tonight we completed part two of ACQ-EXE REM ITXE Card Upgrades with the MTC Team. We completed this next round with REMs 55-128. We had one card failure (REM 81), but we swapped the ITXE Card with a spare (Thanks James) and got that running and retested with MTC. We will be continuing with a third upgrade night tomorrow evening. Please be aware of any reports and let us know if anything pops up. Trevor Bascomb NBCUniversal Manager, Production Systems Engineering
